§ World 18

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**World 18**, usually just shorterned to **18**, is an animation.

§§ Influences

**18** has a number of influences.

Its main influence is //another animation// that was based on a hundreds-of-years-old story called [[journey-to-the-west]] (西遊記) that featured the character [[son-wu-kong]] (孫悟空).

But it is also influenced by:

• ancient Egyptian mythology,
• Persian mythology.
